Goodbye_01:

ever going on a single adventure.

They're really onto something big with
this whole newspaper thing.
Goodbye_03:

stories waiting to be told.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>There are a lot of horses around here...

<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>I did hear that horse god has gone
